Who We Are

For over three decades, Natrapharm has been at the forefront of Philippine healthcare, dedicated to improving lives through quality pharmaceutical products and services.

Building Healthier Communities

Natrapharm was established with a singular purpose: to make quality healthcare accessible to every Filipino family. What started as a modest pharmaceutical company has grown into one of the nation's most trusted names in healthcare.

Our commitment goes beyond manufacturing medicines. We invest in research, partner with healthcare professionals, and run community programs that bring medical care to underserved areas across the Philippines.

Our Mission

To provide accessible, affordable, and quality healthcare solutions that improve the lives of every Filipino.

Our Vision

To be the most trusted pharmaceutical company in the Philippines, known for excellence and compassion.

Our Team

A dedicated workforce of healthcare professionals committed to serving Filipino communities.

Our Reach

Nationwide distribution network ensuring medicines reach every corner of the Philippines.

Our Journey

Three decades of dedication, innovation, and service to Filipino healthcare.

1990

Natrapharm was founded with a vision to transform Philippine healthcare

2000

Expanded operations nationwide, establishing key distribution centers

2010

Launched community health programs reaching over 1 million Filipinos

2020

Pioneered innovative pharmaceutical research and development initiatives

2025

Continuing our commitment to quality healthcare for all Filipinos

Natrapharm

Committed to improving Filipino lives through quality healthcare solutions.
